entities.name: church
entities.description: The church is described as a place where singing is taking place and Harry feels reminded of Hogwarts.

entities.name: war memorial
entities.description: The war memorial is mentioned as something that the statue turns back into.

entities.name: Hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is described as a place where Harry has fond memories of Christmas carols and celebrations.

entities.name: Peeves
entities.description: Peeves is mentioned as someone who would bellow rude versions of carols from inside suits of armor at Hogwarts.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as wearing a bonnet he won in a cracker during Christmas celebrations at Hogwarts.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who wore a hand-knitted sweater during Christmas celebrations at Hogwarts.

entities.description: Godric's Hollow is described as the location where they are walking through the snow.

entities.name: kissing gate
entities.description: The kissing gate is mentioned as something that Hermione pushes open to enter the graveyard.

relationships.description: Harry feels reminded of Hogwarts when he hears the singing at the church.
Peeves would bellow rude versions of carols from inside suits of armor at Hogwarts.
